articles.title: More than 10% of Americans have not gotten their second vaccine dose - Daily Mail
articles.description: About one-in-ten Americans are not returning to receive their second dose of a COVID-19 vaccine. Experts fear these people will be left vulnerable to the virus, and especially variants.
articles.content:
More than 10 percent of Americans have not returned to get their second COVID-19 vaccine shot.
